properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 6 at 2:27PM PST until January 8 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, steep and hazardous seas
10 to 14 feet at 12 seconds expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 kt and seas 10 to 12 feet at 12
seconds.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 4 AM Tuesday to 1
AM PST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST
Tuesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 1 AM to 10 PM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY
